title: Southern-Style Oven-Fried Catfish
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds catfish fillets, cut into serving pieces
1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce or water
method: Step 1: Preheat an oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Grease a 13x9 glass baking dish with the oil, and set aside.

Step 2: Rinse the catfish fillets, and pat dry. In a shallow bowl, combine the cornmeal, creole seasoning, paprika, sugar, and black pepper. Combine the eggs and hot sauce or water in a another bowl. Dip the fillets in the egg mixture, dredge in the cornmeal mixture, and arrange in the baking pan.
Step 3: Bake for 15 minutes, or until cooked through and golden brown. Turn once during cooking. Place catfish on a paper-towel lined plate, and serve immediately with additional hot sauce.
Step 4: The nutrition data for this recipe includes the full amount of the breading ingredients. The actual amount of the breading consumed will vary.
